name: Grapefruit
description: A tangy and slightly bitter citrus fruit, perfect for juicing or fresh consumption. It contains Vitamin C, Fiber, and 42 calories per 100g.

name: Lemon
description: A zesty fruit, ideal for juicing or adding to dishes for a tangy kick. It contains Vitamin C, Potassium, and 29 calories per 100g.

name: Orange
description: A sweet and refreshing citrus fruit packed with vitamin C. It contains Vitamin C, Fiber, and 47 calories per 100g.

name: Mandarin
description: A small, sweet citrus fruit, easy to peel and perfect for snacking. It contains Vitamin C, Fiber, and 53 calories per 100g.

name: Pineapple
description: A tropical fruit with a sweet, tangy flavor, great for smoothies. It contains Vitamin C, Manganese, and 50 calories per 100g.

name: Mango
description: A juicy and fragrant tropical fruit, known for its sweetness. It contains Vitamin A, Vitamin C, and 60 calories per 100g.

name: Papaya
description: A soft and sweet tropical fruit with a vibrant orange color. It contains Vitamin C, Folate, and 43 calories per 100g.

name: Banana
description: A creamy, rich fruit that's a great source of potassium and energy. It contains Vitamin B6, Vitamin C, and 89 calories per 100g.

name: Strawberry
description: A sweet and juicy berry, perfect for desserts or snacks. It contains Vitamin C, Manganese, and 32 calories per 100g.

name: Blueberry
description: Small, sweet berries that are rich in antioxidants. It contains Vitamin C, Vitamin K, and 57 calories per 100g.

name: Raspberry
description: A tart yet sweet berry that is high in fiber and antioxidants. It contains Vitamin C, Manganese, and 52 calories per 100g.

name: Blackberry
description: A sweet and slightly tart berry, perfect for smoothies. It contains Vitamin C, Vitamin K, and 43 calories per 100g.

name: Avocado
description: A creamy fruit, rich in healthy fats and ideal for guacamole or salads. It contains Vitamin E, Vitamin K, and 160 calories per 100g.

name: Tomato
description: A juicy, red fruit often used as a vegetable in salads and cooking. It contains Vitamin C, Vitamin K, and 18 calories per 100g.

name: Pomegranate
description: A ruby-red fruit with juicy seeds, full of antioxidants. It contains Vitamin C, Vitamin K, and 83 calories per 100g.

name: Kiwi
description: A small, fuzzy fruit with a tart and sweet flavor, rich in Vitamin C. It contains Vitamin C, Vitamin K, and 61 calories per 100g.
